title: Effect of the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act (ARRA) on Federal Government Capital Transfer Payments: Capital Grants (DISCONTINUED)
notes: The estimated effect of ARRA on selected NIPA estimates of federal receipts and expenditures. Includes grants for highway and public transit infrastructure construction and restoration.  Estimates of the ARRA’s effects on the NIPAs will not be available for periods after the first quarter of 2013 due to the lack of availability of source data and the declining impact of the ARRA on the NIPAs. For more information about the ARRA, visit http://www.ed.gov/open/plan/recovery-gov.
